revised_title: The Evolution of Newton's Principia: From 1665 to 1686
tldr: This article discusses the evolution of Isaac Newton's Principia from 1665 to 1686. It highlights the conceptual and mathematical challenges Newton faced in developing his ideas on the orbital motion of the Moon and planets. The article also emphasizes the role of Edmond Halley and Robert Hooke in the development of the Principia, as well as the importance of their collaboration.
